Articles.Content:
Not enough cargo space in my Hercules I shuttle always running out of space!

So meet Hercules II!

Now I just need a lifter capable of getting it to orbit......

It's pretty, but it looks like the cargo bay doors are going to clip all through the tail fin and the side fuselages when you try to open them. I won't condemn a little clipping, but with the current shape it looks like there would be no way to open them.
